meanings.sent1: The nonliquid ice cream melted quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The nonliquid glue dried up in the bottle.
meanings.sent3: The nonliquid jellybeans bounced around the room like tiny marbles.
meanings.sent4: Her nonliquid decision was as firm as a rock.
meanings.sent5: The nonliquid mud cracked under the weight of the heavy boots.

meanings.sent4: His nonliquid ideas floated around the room, waiting to be captured.
